title: Minimalist One-Bedroom Eco Apartment in Zamosc Old Town
description: Embrace uncluttered Nordic design in this bright, one-bedroom apartment located in a restored, energy-efficient building. With 58 square meters of open, functional space, this home features a thoughtfully separate guest bathroom and full bathroom, embracing comfort for both residents and visitors. Expansive windows overlook the historic cityscape and distant mountain ridges, flooding the interiors with natural light. Integrated solar panels exemplify modern, sustainable living at its best.
neighborhood_description: Residing in the heart of Stare Miasto, an artistic enclave renowned for its blend of heritage and innovation, this apartment situates you steps from creative studios, tech start-ups, and vibrant community spaces. Zamosc's well-connected public transport system and highway access simplify travel throughout the region. Enjoy direct proximity to galleries, co-working spaces, cozy cafés, and refreshing urban green areas, all framed by local mountain views.
target_buyer: Ideal for long-term renters or single professionals seeking stability, sustainability, and creative inspiration within a tech-oriented artistic community.
market_positioning: Uniquely situated in Zamosc’s characterful Old Town, this eco-conscious home offers contemporary northern style that appeals to those valuing privacy, green living, and the ease of instant connectivity—distinguishing it from classic city-center rentals.
